passive.name: Sweet Dreams
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer's Basic ATK or Skill does not result in a CRIT Hit, increases their CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> for {{3}} turn(s). This effect can only trigger once every {{4}} turn(s).
